description: Determination as to whether prior approval is required for change of use of basement and ground floor from office (Class E) to residential (Class C3) to provide 1 x 1-bedroom flat.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - By reason of insufficient evidence provided and other web-based information on the premises, the applicant has failed to demonstrate that the unit has been vacant for a continuous period of at least 3 months immediately prior to the date of the application for prior approval. The proposal would therefore fail to meet the requirement  MA.1(1)(a)  of  Schedule 2, Part 3 Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 2 - The proposed development would fail to provide sufficient cycle spaces around the site. Therefore, the proposed development fails to comply with Condition MA.2(a) of Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and policy DMS1 of the Development Management Policies Document (2016).

Reason : 3 - The proposed development would fail to provide acceptable natural light levels for all habitable rooms, whilst the ground floor would receive adequate natural light the basement bedroom would receive no light from windows with the only light coming from a internal lightwell resulting in harm to their residential amenity. Therefore, the proposed development fails to comply with Condition MA.2(f) of Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and policy DMS1 of the Development Management Policies Document (2016).

Reason : 4 - The proposed development would fail to provide acceptable waste storage space for future residents. Therefore, the proposed development fails to comply with Condition MA.2(g) of Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and policy DMS1 of the Development Management Policies Document (2016).

Reason : 5 - There has also been insufficient internal floor space provided as the proposed scheme would require a minimum of 58sqm require to provide residential accommodation in line with Paragraphs 9(A) and 9(B) of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).
